name: Infinite Adventures®
description: Infinite Adventures® is a dungeon crawling RPG inspired by classic dungeon RPGs; with fresh new mechanics for exploration, combat, and progression. You are the Traveler, a hero with a forgotten memory. Assemble your party and explore the Infinite Labyrinth to discover the truths of your past.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: VRAM 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 10 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Quad Core 3.0 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: VRAM 1GB DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 10 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 12
